entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
